name: Stirling-PDF
short_description: All-in-one PDF manipulation tool - merge, split, convert, compress, and more.
description: Stirling-PDF is a powerful, locally-hosted web application for all your PDF needs. It provides over 30 PDF operations without sending your documents to any external service. Features include merging/splitting PDFs, rotating pages, extracting images, converting between formats (PDF to images, Word to PDF, etc.), compressing PDFs, adding/removing passwords, digital signatures, OCR for scanned documents, page extraction, and batch operations. It's a complete PDF toolkit that runs entirely on your server, keeping your sensitive documents private.
usecases: Merge multiple PDF files into one document.
Compress large PDFs to reduce file size.
Convert scanned images to searchable PDFs with OCR.
Add or remove password protection from PDFs.
notes: All processing done locally - no data leaves your server
Supports batch processing for multiple files
